result.title: Why using long long fails, but using double gets AC? (when we don't deal with floating point numbers)
result.content: Hello, everybody! I was solving http://codeforces.com/contest/319/problem/C which uses the "Convex Hull Trick". After many failed attempts I peeked at the AC solutions.I found a very interesting thing. This gets AC. However, if I replace the explicit conversion to double, with an explicit conversion to long long (which seems more suitable in this case, since we're not dealing with floating point numbers) I get WA, like this. Now, forgive me if it is a dumb question but I really didn't come across something like this before. Can someody help me figure it out? Thank you!
